meta.Title: INFORMATION, PLEASE [New York Times, Sunday, April 29, 1951]
meta.Author: E. T. Webster

across.question: River in N. Y. and N. J.
Sends to the school of hard knocks.

down.question: Often regarded as first modern novel.
She will play Mrs. Rommel in "The Desert Fox."
